undercover:
秘密的；密探的，卧底的

gild:

to cover (something) with a thin layer of gold
ominous:
凶兆的，不祥的，不吉利的

144

咆哮，发出低沉的吼叫 
to make a deep threatening sound
irresponsible:
无忧无虑的 
having no worries or problems

使陷于困境/泥潭

cunning:
狡猾 
cleverness or skill especially at tricking people in order to get something

狡猾的 
getting what is wanted in a clever and often deceptive way
synthesis:
合成 
the production of a substance by combining simpler substances through a chemical process

综合 
something that is made by combining different things (such as ideas, styles, etc.)
tremulous:
胆小的

culprit:

a person who has committed a crime or done something wrong
decease:
死亡；亡故 
the death of a person
ostracize:
放逐，流放

少有变化，不关心个人的单一庞大的组织 
a single, very large organization, etc. that is very slow to change and not interested in

stake:
赌金，赌注 
something (such as money) that you could win or lose in a game, contest, etc.

145
intoxicate:
使喝醉 使陶醉

befall:
不好的或不幸的降临，发生 
to happen to (someone or something)
viability:
可行性 
the quality of being able to happen or having a reasonable chance of success
stall:
货摊 
a small open counter or partially enclosed structure where things are displayed for sale

使 进程 暂停； 使 推后 
to stop or cause to stop making progress

拖延 
to speak or act in a deliberately vague way in order to gain more time to deal with a

oversight:
疏忽

照管；监督；负责 
the act or job of directing work that is being done
grit:

versatility:
多用途，多功能

易变，反复无常 
the quality of being changeable and inconstant

a group of people, countries, organizations, etc., that are joined together in some activity or effort
ditch:
沟渠 
a long narrow hole that is dug along a road, field, etc., and used to hold or move water

丢弃，抛弃 
to stop having or using (something you no longer want or need); to get rid of (something)
distress:
悲痛 危难，危急

大量的；众多的；丰富的

adolescence:
青春期；青春 
the time in a person's life when he or she develops from a child into an adult
isle: 常用于诗歌和名称中岛，群岛 used especially in poetry and names to mean ‘island’
outperform:
做得比 好；比 更高效 
to exceed in performance
sneer:

农作物等的枯萎病，疫病

to support or help prove (a statement, theory, etc.) by providing information or evidence
repercussion:
不良 反响，反应，影响 
something usually bad or unpleasant that happens as a result of an action, statement, etc.,

headstrong:
固执任性的 
not willing to do what other people want; very stubborn
stricture:
指摘；非难

限制；约束；束缚 
a rule or situation that restricts your behaviour

主体部份；主要影响 
the most important part of something; the most important influence on something
compatible:
兼容的 
able to exist together without trouble or conflict; going together well
hamper:
妨碍；阻止；阻碍

带盖大篮子

rivalry:
竞争；对抗 
a state or situation in which people or groups are competing with each other
ruffle:

to make (someone) irritated, annoyed, worried, etc.

弄皱 
to move or lift (something) so that it is no longer smooth
porous:
多孔的；透水的；透气的 
having many small holes that allow water or air to pass through slowly
be_oblivious_to:
对 无察觉的 
not paying Attention
inveterate:
积习难改的

once_and_for_all:

vice:

格言；准则

戒毒；戒酒

sever:

相等的，相当的

latent:
潜在的；潜伏的；隐藏的
